properties.displayName: Potential Arbitrary DLL Load Using Winword
properties.query:
DeviceProcessEvents
| where (ProcessCommandLine contains "/l " and ProcessCommandLine contains ".dll") and (FolderPath endswith "\\WINWORD.exe" or ProcessVersionInfoOriginalFileName =~ "WinWord.exe")

tags.name: description
tags.value: Detects potential DLL sideloading using the Microsoft Office winword process via the '/l' flag.
